author: Megan Armstrong
title: Report: MLB Discussing Playing Games in Florida, Arizona, Texas to Start Season
description: ESPN's  Jeff Passan  reported on April 6 that Major League Baseball was focusing on a plan to start the 2020 regular season by isolating all 30 clubs in Arizona and playing games ...
content:
Elaine Thompson/Associated Press
ESPN's Jeff Passan reported on April 6 that Major League Baseball was focusing on a plan to start the 2020 regular season by isolating all 30 clubs in Arizona and playing games in the Phoenix area without fan attendance, abid… [+2619 chars]
